TOWN OF CASTLE ROCK, COLORADO
v.
GONZALES, INDIVIDUALLY AND AS NEXT BEST FRIEND OF HER DECEASED MINOR CHILDREN, GONZALES ET AL.

C. A. 10th Cir. [Certiorari granted, ante, p. 955.] Motion of the parties to dispense with printing the joint appendix granted.
